title: (X) Calligraphic handwritten - Liefendre {pattyfab}
content:
Please help me ID this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124117im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mcdonaldlogo_6206.jpg)

 [‹ Help please. Thanks!](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124117/http:/typophile.com/node/39714 "Go to previous forum topic") [Mexicana - help with ugly script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124117/http:/typophile.com/node/39709 "Go to next forum topic")
author: luckysimon

comments.content: I thought it was T26 but I can’t find a sample. It’s by Jim Marcus.
I’m having trouble locating it. Need it. Any ideas? please help
I looked for it but couldn’t find it either. It used to be available from T-26 but they don’t seem to offer it anymore. You could try contacting them directly....

It looks like it’s not Liefendre, after all. Found these examples of Liefendre:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124117im_/http:/typophile.com/files/liefendre_1_4113.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124117im_/http:/typophile.com/files/liefendre_2_5242.jpg)

Your sample is Liefendre. I’m not sure what those other ones are. Where did you find them?

See here too

[http://bowfinprintworks.com/Script10Pg4.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124117/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script10Pg4.html "http://bowfinprintworks.com/Script10Pg4.html")
That looks conclusive, thanks. I’ve emailed T-26 to see if I can still get it.
